#summary DataGrid syntax

= Introduction =

Parameters for a table displaying database content (DataGrid).


= Details =

(todo  0.6 syntax)


*label* a label to display above the search field (may contain HTML/javascript code)

*source* the source of the data to display like a filter defined in DataFilter and built by $filter->build();

*per_page* the number of rows to display per page. Paging and browsing back and forth is handled by the Rapyd framework.

*add_url* the link to a php script to perform an add, change or remove action.

*buttons* an array of buttons to display in the add_url script:
  * _add_ add a new record
  * _delete_ delete the current record
  * _edit_ edit the current record

*columns* an array of columns to display in the DataGrid
